message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your needs. It comes with a range of features that we believe will enhance your experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I would like to propose a price of $100 for it. I hope this aligns with your expectations and budget.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the features you mentioned, but $100 is a bit out of my budget right now.  I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $80 for it.  Let me know what you think.
